package.name: solr
package.summary: The Apache Solr extension is an extremely fast, light-weight, feature-rich library that allows PHP developers to communicate easily and efficiently with Apache Solr server instances using an object-oriented API.
package.description: It effectively simplifies the process of interacting with Apache Solr using PHP.
